languages.text: "Со мной? Это с вами что-то не так! Почему вас не смущает, что я презренный мутант? Что собственные подданные считают меня чудовищем? А ваши слуги боятся моей компании больше, чем встречи с врагом?"

traits.locale_text: "Со мной? Это с вами что-то не так! Почему вас не смущает, что я презренный мутант? Что собственные подданные считают меня чудовищем? А ваши слуги боятся моей компании больше, чем встречи с врагом?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Me? What has got into you? Why does it not perturb you that I'm a wretched mutant? That my own subjects see me as a monster? That your servants fear my company more than facing a mortal enemy?"
languages.original_text: "Со мной? Это с вами что-то не так! Почему вас не смущает, что я презренный мутант? Что собственные подданные считают меня чудовищем? А ваши слуги боятся моей компании больше, чем встречи с врагом?"

traits.locale_text: "Into me? What has gotten into you? Why does it not perturb you that I'm a wretched mutant? That my own subjects see me as a monster? That your servants fear my company more than facing a mortal enemy?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Into me? What has gotten into you? Why does it not perturb you that I'm a wretched mutant? That my own subjects see me as a monster? That your servants fear my company more than facing a mortal enemy?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Me? What has got into you? Why does it not perturb you that I'm a wretched mutant? That my own subjects see me as a monster? That your servants fear my company more than facing a mortal enemy?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Me? What has got into you? Why does it not perturb you that I'm a wretched mutant? That my own subjects see me as a monster? That your servants fear my company more than facing a mortal enemy?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Me? What has got into you? Why does it not perturb you that I'm a wretched mutant? That my own subjects see me as a monster? That your servants fear my company more than facing a mortal enemy?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “是我怎么了？还是你怎么了？为什么你不会厌恶我这个可憎的变种人？连我自己的臣民都把我当成怪物，你的仆人害怕我，甚于害怕面对他们的死敌，可你为什么不嫌弃我？”
languages.original_text: "Me? What has got into you? Why does it not perturb you that I'm a wretched mutant? That my own subjects see me as a monster? That your servants fear my company more than facing a mortal enemy?"

traits.locale_text: “是我怎么了？还是你怎么了？为什么你不会厌恶我这个可憎的变种人？连我自己的臣民都把我当成怪物，你的仆人害怕我，甚于害怕面对他们的死敌，可你为什么不嫌弃我？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich? Was ist in Euch gefahren? Warum stört es Euch nicht, dass ich eine schändliche Mutantin bin? Dass meine eigenen Untertanen mich für ein Monster halten? Dass Eure Diener meine Gesellschaft mehr fürchten als eine Begegnung mit einem grauenhaften Feind?"
languages.original_text: "Me? What has got into you? Why does it not perturb you that I'm a wretched mutant? That my own subjects see me as a monster? That your servants fear my company more than facing a mortal enemy?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich? Was ist in Euch gefahren? Warum stört es Euch nicht, dass ich eine schändliche Mutantin bin? Dass meine eigenen Untertanen mich für ein Monster halten? Dass Eure Diener meine Gesellschaft mehr fürchten als eine Begegnung mit einem grauenhaften Feind?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce qui m'a pris ? À moi de vous retourner la question. Cela ne vous perturbe pas que je sois une horrible mutante ? Que mes propres sujets me voient comme un monstre ? Que vos serviteurs craignent ma compagnie plus que d'affronter un ennemi mortel ? »
languages.original_text: "Me? What has got into you? Why does it not perturb you that I'm a wretched mutant? That my own subjects see me as a monster? That your servants fear my company more than facing a mortal enemy?"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce qui m'a pris ? À moi de vous retourner la question. « Cela ne vous perturbe pas que je sois une horrible mutante ? Que mes propres sujets me voient comme un monstre ? Que vos serviteurs craignent ma compagnie plus que d'affronter un ennemi mortel ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Yo? ¿Qué le pasa? ¿Por qué no le perturba que sea un miserable mutante? Que mis propios súbditos me vean como un monstruo. Que sus siervos teman más mi compañía que enfrentarse a un enemigo mortal».
languages.original_text: "Me? What has got into you? Why does it not perturb you that I'm a wretched mutant? That my own subjects see me as a monster? That your servants fear my company more than facing a mortal enemy?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Yo? ¿Qué le pasa? ¿Por qué no le perturba que sea un miserable mutante? Que mis propios súbditos me vean como un monstruo. Que sus siervos teman más mi compañía que enfrentarse a un enemigo mortal».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしが？あたくしは{name}様に何かしましたか？あたくしが哀れな変異体であることに、なぜ{name}様は動揺しないのでしょう？あたくしの臣下もあたくしを化け物扱いしているのに？{name}様の使用人たちがあたくしの仲間を、命を脅かす敵と遭遇するより恐れているのに？」
languages.original_text: "Me? What has got into you? Why does it not perturb you that I'm a wretched mutant? That my own subjects see me as a monster? That your servants fear my company more than facing a mortal enemy?"

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしが？あたくしは{name}様に何かしましたか？あたくしが哀れな変異体であることに、なぜ{name}様は動揺しないのでしょう？あたくしの臣下もあたくしを化け物扱いしているのに？{name}様の使用人たちがあたくしの仲間を、命を脅かす敵と遭遇するより恐れているのに？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bana mı? Asıl sana ne oldu? Aşağılık bir mutant oluşum seni neden rahatsız etmiyor? Kendi kullarımın dahi bana bir canavar gözüyle bakması? Hizmetkârlarının beni görünce ezeli düşmanlarıymışım gibi korkması?"
languages.original_text: "Me? What has got into you? Why does it not perturb you that I'm a wretched mutant? That my own subjects see me as a monster? That your servants fear my company more than facing a mortal enemy?"
